name: Guitar hobbyist
value: Finally started learning to play when I turned 50 in 2017. Am hooked.

name: Theatre artist at heart
value: Spent 25 years doing theatre (MFA from ACT in SF), had to give it up to escape poverty

name: Recovering political junkie
value: Still paying attention, but it's become too toxic to stay as glued as I used to

name: Peace
value: anti-war, anti-fascist, anti-racist, anti-sexist, anti-homophobia, anti-transphobia, anti-xenophobia, et al
